nws.name: Today
nws.detailedForecast: Rain showers and areas of fog. Cloudy, with a high near 55. North wind around 7 mph. Chance of precipitation is 100%. New rainfall amounts between a tenth and quarter of an inch possible.

nws.name: Tonight
nws.shortForecast: Areas Of Fog then Mostly Cloudy
nws.detailedForecast: Areas of fog and a chance of rain showers before 8pm, then rain showers likely and areas of fog between 8pm and 10pm. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 35. West wind 7 to 15 mph, with gusts as high as 28 mph. Chance of precipitation is 60%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

nws.name: Veterans Day
nws.shortForecast: Partly Sunny then Isolated Rain And Snow Showers
nws.detailedForecast: Isolated rain showers between noon and 5pm, then isolated rain and snow showers. Partly sunny, with a high near 41. West wind 16 to 22 mph, with gusts as high as 43 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

nws.name: Tuesday Night
nws.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 34. West wind 15 to 22 mph, with gusts as high as 38 mph.

nws.name: Wednesday
nws.shortForecast: Slight Chance Rain And Snow Showers then Mostly Cloudy
nws.detailedForecast: A slight chance of rain and snow showers between 7am and noon. Mostly cloudy, with a high near 46. Southwest wind 9 to 16 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

nws.detailedForecast: A slight chance of rain showers between 1am and 3am. Partly cloudy, with a low around 36. West wind around 12 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

nws.name: Thursday
nws.detailedForecast: A slight chance of rain showers. Partly sunny, with a high near 50. West wind 12 to 15 mph.

nws.detailedForecast: A slight chance of snow after 5am. Mostly clear, with a low around 31. Northwest wind 6 to 9 mph.
